UNION ALL

SELECT BOOK.id AS id, employeeId, startDate, endDate, regDate, meetingRoomId AS targetId, 'MEETING_ROOM' AS targetType, MEETING_ROOM.NAME AS targetName FROM BOOK JOIN MEETING_ROOM ON BOOK.meetingRoomId = MEETING_ROOM.id
UNION ALL
SELECT BOOK.id AS id, employeeId, startDate, endDate, regDate, furnitureId AS targetId, 'FURNITURE' AS targetType, FURNITURE.NAME AS targetName FROM BOOK JOIN FURNITURE ON BOOK.furnitureId = FURNITURE.id
